name: developer-roadmap-plugin
description: Comprehensive learning plugin with 7 specialized agents covering Backend, Frontend, DevOps, Data Science, System Architecture, Mobile, and Cloud development from the official roadmap.sh
author: Developer Roadmap Contributors

agents.name: Backend Developer
agents.description: Expert backend specialist for APIs, databases, and server architecture

agents.name: Frontend Developer
agents.description: Expert frontend specialist for web UI and React/Vue development

agents.name: DevOps Engineer
agents.description: Expert DevOps specialist for infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines

agents.name: Data Scientist & AI Engineer
agents.description: Expert data science specialist for ML models and AI solutions

agents.name: System Architect
agents.description: Expert architect for large-scale system design and optimization

agents.name: Mobile Developer
agents.description: Expert mobile specialist for iOS, Android, and cross-platform development

agents.name: Cloud Engineer
agents.description: Expert cloud specialist for AWS and cloud infrastructure

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start your learning journey with role selection

commands.name: browse-agent
commands.description: Explore all 7 specialized agents and their capabilities

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Self-assess your knowledge across different tech roles

commands.name: projects
